name: Base Recipe - American Amber Ale
notes:
### [Base Recipe] A Dark, balanced, full-bodied American Amber Ale

**OG**: 1.069   **FG**: 1.01
**ABV**: ~8.1%    **IBU**: ~37

**SRM**: 24.0   **Batch Size**: 2.5 Gal   **Start Water**: 3.65 Gal (30.44 lbs)

#### Grain Bill (total weight: 8.73lb)

| Grain/Sugar  | Weight | Color (°Lovibond) | Gravity | Notes | 
| ------------------- | ------- | ------------- |
| American Two-Row Pale | 7lb | 1.8°L | 1.0368 |
| German Munich | .5lb | 8°L | 1.0366 |
| American Crystal 40L | .5lb | 40°L | 1.034 |
| American Crystal 120L | .3lb | 120°L | 1.033 |
| American Chocolate | .2lb | 350°L | 1.0276 |
| American Victory | .3lb | 25°L | 1.0336 |
  
#### Hop Schedule
  
| Variety/Adjunct  | Weight | Alpha Acid (AA%) | Notes | 
| ------------- | -----: | ----- |
| Magnum | 7.08g (.35oz) | 13.5% | @ 60m |
| Cascade | 7.08g (.35oz) | 7.1% | @ 10m |
| Centennial | 7.08g (.35oz) | 9.3% | @ 10m |
| Cascade | 7.08g (.35oz) | 7.1% | @ 1m |
| Centennial | 7.08g (.35oz) | 9.3% | @ 1m |

##### Optional Additions/Customizations
This beer may also be dry hopped post fermentation with 1/2 ounce each of Cascade* and Centennial* hops for 5-8 days at room temperature for a more hop forward aroma.
*not included in the recipe / ingredient instructions.
  
  
##### Fermentation
Fermentis (US-05) - SafAle - 78-82% attenuation, 62-82°F, pitch temp 65°F
  
| Purpose  | Temp | Time | 
| ------------- | -----: | ----- |
| Primary | 68°F | 10d |
| Cold Crash | 38-42°F  | 1-3d |
